text: |Site proposal|Details| ||| |Indicative capacities|1,650 homes 56,000sqm commercial floorspace| |Phasing|2030-34| Land uses, activities, and delivery z Development should consist of a mixed-use scheme with elements of residential and employment floorspace. z Acceptable land uses include: – Residential (Class C3) – maximum of 75% of floorspace – Town centre uses (Class E) – at least 25% of floorspace – Community uses (Class F1/F2) z Required on-site infrastructure includes: – Community centre z The site is within the Canary Wharf Fringe and is expected to provide at least 25% of the floorspace as commercial uses, with a focus on Central Activities Zone strategic uses as defined in the London Plan. z Development proposals must include the raising of flood defences
